T = int (raw_input())
while T > 0:
    T -= 1
    N = int (raw_input())
    ip = map(int, raw_input().split(' '))
    resArr = [0] * 10001
    for item in ip:
        resArr[item] += 1
    index = 0
    curmax = 0
    for ctr in range(0, len(resArr)):
        if resArr[ctr] > curmax:
            curmax = resArr[ctr]
            index = ctr
    print index, ' ', curmax
